content: sm k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk knit to end -4 sts decrease d round 2 knit repeat these 2 rnds until 32 36 sts rem work round 1 until 16 total sts rem k4 to be in position to graft live toe sts finishing cut yarn and use tail to graft toe sew in all ends and block if desired © 2014 susan dittrich www handknitsbysusan wordpress com handknitsbysusan@gmail com handknits by susan patterns are for personal use only and may not to be used to create items for sale do not copy distribute or resell this pattern all handknits by susan patterns are copyrighted to susan dittrich page 4 © 2014 susan dittrich www handknitsbysusan wordpress com handknitsbysusan@gmail com handknits by susan patterns are for personal use only and may not to be used to create items for sale do not copy distribute or resell this pattern all handknits by susan patterns are copyrighted to susan dittrich page 5
